review: Perfect! Does exactly what my originally priced Fire Stick does and for about $10 less! Although I'd appreciate if they added more language features, especifically spanish. I have family that would use it more often if it was in their native language! Anyway, buy refurbished, guys. It's a no brainer!
author: Antonio A.
